title: Tankatek

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Tankatek. The average
  contract duration was 0.38 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $205.5K. The longest
  contract was 1.12 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.6M.
lookup_name: 'TANKATEK'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '50'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '26%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '7%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.23'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '14.1K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.38'
s421_mean_contract_value: '205.5K'
s425_max_duration: '1.12'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.6M'
---
